## Proposal Overview
- **Requestor:** <!-- GitHub handle or team -->
- **Target Decision Date:** <!-- YYYY-MM-DD -->
- **Affected Artefacts:** <!-- specs, schemas, docs, implementations -->

## Change Summary
Provide a concise description of the change, the problem it solves, and why it matters. Link to design docs or PRs where relevant.

## Expected Benefits
List the key outcomes or improvements this proposal delivers.

## Risks & Mitigations
Identify technical, ethical, financial, or operational risks and how you plan to address them.

## Dependencies
Call out any teams, infrastructure, or external standards this change relies on.

## Evidence & References
Link supporting materials (metrics, community discussions, prototypes, simulations).

## Stakeholder Signals
Summarise any feedback already received from community members, integrators, or working groups.

## Additional Notes
Include anything else the Review Board should know before deliberations begin.
